title: Leonard M. Baca Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarships for undergraduate and graduate students in the School of Education at CU Boulder selected by the BUENO Center for Multicultural Education.  If $25,000 is raised within five years, a permanent endowment will be created.
marketingContent: To provide scholarships for undergraduate and graduate students in the School of Education at CU Boulder selected by the BUENO Center for Multicultural Education.  If $25,000 is raised within five years, a permanent endowment will be created.
